features: 🚗【360° Rotating Stunt Car Toys】2 pack double sided flip car, which each side has a different color. our pull back car is more novel in appearance design. Pushing the reverse side of the monster toy truck, it will rotate 360˚with the prop of the front side, when encountering obstacles, pull back toy car will automatically flip over, bringing more fun to kids.

🚙【Friction Powered, No Battery Needed】No batteries required, no remote controller. Flip cars for toddlers with strong power 4 wheel inertia drive, just push the toy car forward a few times to get strong power, and then quickly release them, these pull back cars for kids will run to all-direction with strong inertia power, the inertia car only needs to be pushed gently, easy for kids to play with.

🚗【DURABLE ABS MATERIAL】The toddler boy toy made out of premium ABS plastic non-toxic and tasteless environmental spray painting, with anti-collision & shockproof protection, environment friendly and safe. Cars for toddlers 1-3 have a cool looking with super strong toughness, anti-falling & durable, which are safety tested, no worries for your kids playing.

🚕【Stimulate Kids Interest】With these monster friction trucks, your kids are able to build a racing game to gain more fun in the playing time. Friction powered cars stimulate their interest to learn and explore during playing time, Parents and grandparents can accompany children to play with toy trucks, which is conducive to promoting the affection between parents and children and allowing children to grow up healthily.

🎁【Great Gifts for Kids】Perfect gifts for children's birthdays, Christmas, New Year and other holidays. Not only a car toy but also a communicative link between you and kids. In addition, Inertia car toys can develop kids' interaction, social and sport skills during playing and are the ideal toy gift for boys and girls.

Kids could have much fun with these monster inertia trucks even though playing alone. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you looking for a Christmas gift for children? M SANMERSEN 4 Pcs Cool Monster Toys Trucks is a perfect choice. It can help you and your child to gain more fun in leisure hours, it can be played not only in your home, but also outdoors, and makes every day full of fun! M SANMERSEN 2 pack mini pull back vehicles are classic learning and educational toys for children, inspire your little one’s creativity, imagination, exercise hand-eye coordination and color perception ability.

Perfect size is suitable for little toddler's hands The toy cars with perfect size and shape is suitable for little toddler's hands.Each car size is about 4 inches in length and for easy gripping.The handy toy set are available for baby to take with them anywhere. Package Included: 1 x blue + red monster toy truck 1 x green + yellow monster toy truck Pull Back Car Toys By moving the monster car truck toys, it can exercise the child's hands-on coordination ability, and also bring new joy to the child for several hours or longer. Kids could have much fun with these monster inertia trucks even though playing alone. Specification: Size of Inertia Car: 9.4cm/4inch * 9cm/ 3.5inch * 4.5cm/2inch Weight of Truck: 0.53 Ib Material: ABS, BPA-free Suitable Age: 3 years old and up Color: green + yellow(one car), blue + red(one car)

4-wheels Inertia Drive Four big wheels are driven, with just a light push, the car can travel a long distance, suitable for children aged 3+. Two-way Push and Go Cars A lovely gift for children, if you want to bring a surprise to the children around you. Then these new design monster toys cars will be the best choice, double-sided friction powered vehicles, suitable for birthday gifts, Christmas gifts, party gifts and other holiday gifts. 180 degree flip stunt This truck can double-sided rotate 180°, which will be of interest to children. When it encounters an obstacle, it can still move forward. In addition, its model design determines that the car can adapt to a variety of terrain, and also allows children to play anywhere, anytime.

Monster toy truck set not only brings fun to the children, Helps cultivate children's interest, develops intelligence, improves operation and thinking skills, but also a good opportunity for parent-child interaction.With this car toy set, children can play with their friends or family, which can improve their interaction and teamwork skills.

Perfect car toys set is a great gift for children. The toys car set as your special gift for boys and girls in birthday, Christmas, Thanksgiving day or any other festival. Funny and amazing, your kids would definitely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great and easy to play with. Kept my nephew busy for hours that I had to buy more for my other nephew.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun! Cars flip when hit wall!
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than expected but work great. Cool to see cars flip over! No batteries or tech involved just old fashioned fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to push
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 2 1/2-year-old grandson. They are a bit difficult for him to handle. But all in all, they are an excellent purchase. I think if he was older there wouldn’t be any problem. Sometimes when he tries to push it, it only goes about an inch or so. I’m not exactly sure why. But he enjoys them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my two year old for his birthday last year and they still work a year later, they are awesome you just pulled back and let him go they flip on walls it's really cool I recommend these highly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kind of so so product
reviews.reviewText: You have to turn one side over to get the best result. Little kids wouldn't know that. Colorful toy. Works good on floors. Didn't try on carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Grandson Loves them
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as a gift for my 2yr old grandson. He walked around with them all day Christmas. They're medium size cars. Perfect for a toddler. Kept him occupied. Good gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My kids played with the cars maybe 3 times. They stopped working properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These cars are so cool!
reviews.reviewText: These are so much fun and the kids love them too! HaHaHa! I'm so glad I bought both color sets! They are amazingly durable and perfect for the two year old that received them. I would definitely buy them again!

reviews.reviewTitle: One car stopped working after about an hour. Was not treated roughly.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for my grandson. One of the two cars stopped working within an hour. The other one kept working. He was thrilled with them when they worked! And disappointed when one stopped working. So was I. (He was gentle with them.)
